sentences.en: A free raffle ticket is given with every receipt.
sentences.cn: 一张收据可以得到一张抽奖券.

sentences.en: Any more raffle tickets? Twenty-five pence each or five for a pound.
sentences.cn: 还有要买奖券的吗？每张25便士，1英镑5张。

sentences.en: Buy lots of raffle ticket and multiply your chance of success.
sentences.cn: 多买彩票,增加你中奖的机会.

sentences.en: Buy lots of raffle tickets and multiply your chances of success.
sentences.cn: 多买彩票,增加你中奖的机会.

sentences.en: During each show we will be raffling a fabulous prize.
sentences.cn: 每次展览我们都会通过抽彩送出惊人的奖品。

sentences.en: Event program book advertising space available; raffle prize donations welcome.
sentences.cn: 欢迎各厂商购登年刊广告和捐赠 摸彩 奖品.

sentences.en: Her decks forward are covered with raffle.
sentences.cn: 船前面甲板上堆满了绳索杂物.

sentences.en: I won this doll in a raffle.
Much to his surprise, Ted won first prize in the raffle.
sentences.cn: 使他大吃一惊的是, 特德在抽彩中得了头奖.

sentences.en: My luck's in I won a new car in a raffle.
sentences.cn: 我的运气来了--在有奖抽彩中我得了一辆新汽车.

sentences.en: Our plan is to raffle a car rental valued at $ 300.
sentences.cn: 我们的计划是租一辆车价值在$300.

sentences.en: She is too penny - pinching to buy a raffle ticket.
sentences.cn: 她这个人真小气,连一张彩票也不卖.

sentences.en: The draw for the raffle takes place on Saturday.
The money is raised by the sale of raffle ticket.
sentences.cn: 这笔款是通过出售购物彩券筹集的.

sentences.en: The money was raised by the sale of raffle tickets.
sentences.cn: 这笔款子是通过出售购物彩券筹集的.

sentences.en: This, however, is a raffle that the female wants to lose.
sentences.cn: 然而, 这并不是雌性想要的.

trans.tran_en: a competition or game in which people buy numbered tickets and can win prizes
If someone raffles something, they give it as a prize in a raffle

trans.tran_cn: 以抽彩方式出售，加入抽彩
